title: Phase 0.7: FFI Version Checking
description: Add runtime version/capability detection for Go and Python consumers. Implement rlm_version() FFI, rlm_has_feature() FFI for feature detection. Update Go bindings with HasAdversarialSupport() and SafeEventTypeName(). Update Python bindings with get_validator() fallback.
close_reason: Added FFI functions (rlm_version_*, rlm_has_feature, rlm_available_features) and Python bindings (version, version_tuple, has_feature, available_features) for runtime capability detection.

title: Phase 2.3: Migration System
description: Implement bidirectional migration between Beads and Chainlink. Create scripts/migrate_beads_to_chainlink.py and scripts/migrate_chainlink_to_beads.py. Add MigrationTransaction pattern with checkpoint support. Generate mapping file for ID translation.
close_reason: Added /dp:migrate command with beads-to-chainlink and chainlink-to-beads directions. Created scripts/migrate.py with MigrationTransaction pattern, --dry-run support, and mapping file generation. Committed: 2e96a0e

close_reason: Implemented 5-level degradation framework (Full→Reduced→Manual→Safe→Recovery) with health checks for config, git, task tracker, beads daemon. Includes auto-repair, state persistence, and feature availability tracking. Integrated with hooks. Committed: 466b87c
